title: Should Pangolin move multi chain ?
body:
Being a DEX was ingenious 2 years ago. Being a multi chain DEX is now necessary to attract more users (like Sushiswap is doing). By this we could give more visibility et utility to PNG token.
By being multi chain I mean :
Implement a cross chain service transfer INTO Pangolin (and stop using an external bridge, it is not user friendly at all for beginners). Ethereum blockchain and BSC would be considered first.
To build it I propose to use unclaimed PNG token from the Airdrop if necessary.
author: 0xB33969b4681622Cd4f2e802F87bCb338e7A171c5
